QuestData.Title: Arconiss Thirsts
QuestData.Description: Arconiss fights with unmatched fury, but his extended stay beneath the mists has left him weakened.$b$bThe rodents of the swamp are plentiful, and their bodies are filled with nourishing blood. Return with blood enough to reignite Arconiss' spirit.
QuestData.CompletionText: Our preparation will not take much longer.
QuestData.RewardText: Yet another step closer to completing my mission.
